ygData.subject: enchantment of light and brillance
ygData.msgSnippet: heyas all i was just curious what you all thought about these two spells beign removed from the game. I mean we are supposed to be enchanters right but the
ygData.messageBody:
heyas all i was just curious what you all thought about these two spells
beign removed from the game. I mean we are supposed to be enchanters right
but the only things we can enchant or metals which seem to not do to much
for us considering they sell for less then they cost for us to make them.
Are the peopl at EQ going to give us other enchantments maybe something that
lets us add a fire effect or a ice effect to a weapon something that will at
least be of service to us. I dont know i may be wrong on this but i dont
find it fair for are enchantment spells to be taken away we are supposed to
be enchanters not another form or wizard


aldron
